items.title: ToneZ refuses to load in LMMS
items.body:
I'm having an odd issue where ToneZ refuses to load in LMMS at all. I'm using a 64 bit version of LMMS and loading the VST located in `C:/Program Files/Steinberg/VSTplugins` and nothing. VeSTige shows as no VST loaded even after attempting to reinstall the VST multiple times. When attempting to load it in VeSTige, it shows something on the bottom left that disappears too fast for me to read it (may have to do a screen recording and edit/reply once I find out what it says if it's an error)

LMMS version is 1.2.2 and I'm attempting to run ToneZ version 1.3.

EDIT: I recorded a small clip and went frame by frame in my video editor of choice, turns out it wasn't an error message but something else.
![ToneZ What](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/50846413/114641329-8fb60e80-9c97-11eb-995d-b789e3f86940.PNG)

I also have a clip of what it's doing when I try to load it:

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/50846413/114641374-9fcdee00-9c97-11eb-8c5f-9d570f1cdea0.mp4

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

I would also like to add that I downloaded ToneZ from the retornz website, I didn't do any compiling to get it.
